text: Albara hollowayi is a moth in the family Drepanidae. It was described by Watson in 1970. It is found in Taiwan and on Sumatra, Peninsular Malaysia and Borneo. The habitat consists of lowland forests, extending weakly into montane forests.The Moths of Borneo ==References== Category:Moths described in 1970 Category:Drepaninae Category:Moths of Asia
title: Albara hollowayi
